item.title: Powerpoint Designer and Green Screen Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced PowerPoint designer who is also proficient in editing green screen videos. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for design and be able to create visually appealing and professional PowerPoint presentations. Additionally, they should have the skills to edit green screen videos and create high-quality videos that captivate and engage viewers.

    Responsibilities:
    - Designing visually appealing and professional PowerPoint presentations
    - Editing green screen videos and creating captivating videos
    - Collaborating with the team to understand requirements and deliver high-quality work

    Requirements:
    - Proficiency in PowerPoint design and video editing
    - Strong attention to detail and an eye for visual design
    - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

    If you are a creative individual with a passion for design and video editing, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work and let us know why you would be a good fit for this role.


Posted On: June 29, 2024 02:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Clipping of DJ Sets - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a freelancer who can find and clip videos of people DJing. The videos should be approximately 1 minute long and should prominently display the track ID. The videos should be formatted for tik tok. The task involves thorough research and attention to detail to identify suitable videos that meet our requirements. The freelancer will be responsible for accurately capturing and clipping these videos, ensuring that the track ID is clearly visible. This project requires someone with a good understanding of popular DJs, house music, techno, and EDM. If you have a keen eye for detail and are passionate about house music, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 02:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Creator and Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create and edit faceless health-related YouTube videos. As a YouTube video creator and editor, you will be responsible for producing high-quality videos that engage and inform our audience. Your role will involve scripting, filming, and editing videos, ensuring they are visually appealing, well-paced, and aligned with our brand. The ideal candidate should have experience in video production, storytelling, and editing software. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are essential. If you are passionate about health and wellness and have a creative eye, this is the perfect opportunity for you.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong storytelling and narrative skills
- Knowledge of video production techniques and best practices
- Attention to detail
- Ability to work independently

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 02:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
